H0.text: A tornado is the result of rapid shifting in Earth's surface.

H1.text: An earthquake is the result of the rapid shifting in Earth's surface.

H2.text: A volcano is the result of the rapid shifting in Earth's surface.

H3.text: An avalanche is the result of the rapid shifting in Earth's surface.

A4.text: Earthquakes are caused mostly by the rupture of geological faults but also by other events such as volcanic activity, landslides, mine blasts, fracking and nuclear tests.

A5.text: Earthquakes are caused by the movement of the Earth's tectonic plates.
